professionalSummary: Full-stack developer (5+ yrs) delivering microservices and web apps with Java/Spring Boot and Node.js. Shipped features that cut API latency ~40% and accelerated releases ~20% via CI/CD and observability. Built and operated services on public cloud (Azure/GCP), containerized with Docker, and enforced quality gates (Cypress, JUnit, SonarQube). Ready to apply this to AWS workloads (API Gateway, Lambda, S3, RDS/DynamoDB) to support secure, scalable migrations and serverless delivery.

skillsCategories.name: Cloud & DevOps
skillsList: AWS (API Gateway, Lambda, S3, RDS/DynamoDB — foundational)

bullets: Spearheaded a revenue-driving Promotional Tab feature (React + Java microservices), aligned to modular, scalable architecture.
Reduced avg API latency ~40% via event-driven patterns and caching; improved page responsiveness and user engagement.
Containerized services with Docker and deployed on GCP Compute Engine; integrated Firestore + Cloud Functions for real-time sync.
Established quality gates (Cypress E2E, JUnit/Mockito, SonarQube) and streamlined CI/CD, speeding releases ~20%.
Enhanced logging/monitoring (GCP Logging, Firebase Monitoring) to cut debugging time ~30% and server load ~35%.
Built microservices with Spring Boot on JBoss and integrated Angular/React frontends to deliver responsive UIs.
Implemented CI/CD with Azure DevOps and Git workflows, improving release cadence by ~35% and reducing rollbacks.
Hardened services with OAuth2/JWT and API gateway policies; embedded Black Duck scans to mitigate OSS risks pre-release.
Instrumented services using Datadog (APM, logs, dashboards) enabling rapid RCA and ~20% uptime improvement.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
bullets: Built a personal site to showcase work and code samples.

awards.name: Star of the Quarter — Microservices Delivery
highlights: Led Java/Spring Boot + Node.js services rollout on a high-traffic product
Improved API latency by ~40% via caching and event-driven patterns

awards.name: Innovation Spotlight — Serverless Cost Optimizer
highlights: Prototyped Lambda + S3 + API Gateway workflow to trim batch costs
Cut monthly runtime by ~25% in pilot using asynchronous invocations

body: I am excited to apply for the Full-Stack Developer position at [Company Name], as advertised. With over five years of experience in developing and deploying scalable web applications and microservices, I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively to your team.

In my previous role at Tata Consultancy Services, I led the development of a revenue-driving Promotional Tab feature using React and Java microservices. This project not only enhanced user engagement but also reduced API latency by approximately 40% through the implementation of event-driven patterns and caching strategies. My hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as Azure and GCP, along with containerization using Docker, has equipped me with the skills necessary to build and operate robust services in dynamic environments.

I am particularly drawn to this opportunity at [Company Name] because of your commitment to innovation and excellence in technology. I am eager to bring my expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, and cloud services to your team, and I am excited about the prospect of contributing to projects that drive business success.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my background, skills, and certifications align with the needs of your team. Please feel free to contact me at +1-437-533-4583 or via email
